about:
I am Palakurthi Raja Karthik, a passionate researcher and developer with a strong background in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing. Currently, I am a Project Associate at the Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, where I work on cutting-edge projects involving generative AI, autonomous agents, and text-based simulations.

I am driven by a desire to solve real-world problems through innovative technology. My journey includes contributing to projects like retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) applications, large language models, and culturally inclusive AI systems. Outside of work, I enjoy mentoring aspiring developers, exploring advancements in AI research, and creating impactful solutions that bridge societal gaps.

My goal is to pursue advanced research in AI to develop adaptive, responsible, and inclusive systems that empower communities and improve lives globally.
